summary: RECENT RECALL OF SOME 1994-1997 CHEVROLET ASTRO, SUV AND PICKUPS TO FIX FAULTY WINDSHIELD WIPERS.  THE RECALL EXCLUDED 1994 CHEVROLET ASTRO, WHICH I OWN.  MY WIPERS FAIL PERIODICALLY.  WHEN I TURN THEM ON I HEAR THE MOTOR HUMMING BUT THE WIPERS DO NOT MOVE.  I HAVE A FRIEND WITH THE SAME YEAR ASTRO AND THE SAME PROBLEM.  PLEASE MAKE CHEVROLET CORP.
